open_api_settings.title: OpenAI settings
open_api_settings.api_key_link: Please click here to obtain your API Key.
open_api_settings.api_key_description: The API Key is saved locally and not maintained on the server as this is a static application. It is saved in the browser's local storage. It is recommended to set a usage limit beforehand.

chat.usage_tokens: {tokens, plural, =0 {No tokens} one {1 token} other {{tokens} tokens}}, {currency}
